name: @kernel-js/storage
description: Web Storage package for Kernel Framework

scripts.test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=test mocha --require jsdom-global --require mock-local-storage --require babel-core/register --recursive
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es6
scripts.build:cjs: mkdir -p dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/
scripts.build:es6: mkdir -p es6 && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es6 babel src --out-dir es6/
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test

author: Gus <gus@brid-it.com>
